original_text: I will take away your bread so that famine kills more and more of you. It will seem that I am shooting arrows at you to destroy you.
korean_text: 내가 멸망하게 하는 기근의 독한 화살을 너희에게 보내되 기근을 더하여 너희가 의뢰하는 양식을 끊을 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will take away your bread
so that famine kills more and more of you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 기근이 너희를 더욱 많이 죽이게 하리라

sentences.original_text: It will seem that I am shooting arrows at you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 향해 화살을 쏘는 것처럼 보일 것이다
